verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
1.Soul of my savior sanctify my breast,
Body of Christ be thou my saving guest,

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Blood of my savior bathe me in thy tide,
Wash me ye waters flowing flowing from his side,

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
2.Strength and protection may thy passion be;
O blessed Jesus hear and answer me

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Deep in thy wound ,Lord hide and shelter me;
so shall i never,never part from thee.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
3.Guard and defend me,from the foe malign;
In death's dread moments make me only thine

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
Call me and bid mecome to the on high,
where I may praise thee,with thy saints for aye
